MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK2 area of Falkirk. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:59am. Our next available engineer will attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10:13 AM on Monday, 15 February 2021.
